name: MOD
description: The MOD class provides access to TouchDesigner module functionality, allowing you to work with Python modules and extensions within TouchDesigner.

members.name: path
members.description: The file path of the module

members.name: time_loaded
members.description: Timestamp when the module was loaded

members.name: is_loaded
members.description: Boolean indicating if the module is currently loaded

methods.name: get_function
methods.description: Get a function from the module by name

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the function to retrieve

methods.name: get_class
methods.description: Get a class from the module by name

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the class to retrieve

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Execute Python code within the module's namespace
